xmlquery.searchDevice: Select * from smiot_device order by updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceTrx: Select * from smiot_devicetrx where idSite = ? order by updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceByAnyLike: Select * from smiot_device where idDevice like ? or idDeviceType like ? or idSite like ?
xmlquery.deviceEdit: Update smiot_device set idSite=?, idDevice=?, idDeviceType=? where idDevice=?
